product_name: Timex Flex Tech Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap - XX Large
long_description: The XX Large Timex Flex Tech heart rate monitor replacement chest strap holds a heart rate sensor (sold separately) comfortably and securely to help you track your data for peak physical performance. Soft, adjustable and breathable strap is hand- and machine-washable. Fits chests 34 - 66 in. (73 - 148cm). Timex Flex Tech heart rate monitor chest strap only; sensor not included.
short_description: The XX Large Timex Flex Tech heart rate monitor replacement chest strap holds a heart rate sensor (sold separately) comfortably and securely to help you track your data for peak physical performance.
